name: Adri AI
headline: Vanta for AI
description:
Adri is built for enterprises that are buying AI. 

Our patented software monitors the AI vendor's infrastructure and detects any intentional or accidental misuse of your proprietary data.

We help you buy AI that you can trust.

founders.name: Darshita Chaturvedi, Founder
founders.description: MIT Sloan dropout, Director's Gold Medal at IIT, voting member at Python Software Foundation, ML researcher at BlackRock (co-creator of a financial product that was one of the fastest-growing asset management product in the US with $5M+ in asset flow in a year within its launch)

founders.name: Shyam Swaroop, Founder
founders.description: Columbia CS dropout, DARPA funded ML researcher turned web developer for ML products (lead engineer of the software product with $10M+/year in revenue)

# DeliverError-FreeERP migrations
Use AI agents to dig deeper into your client's business processes and catch every critical detail
[Try it for free](https://www.getadri.ai/</signup>)
[Sign in](https://www.getadri.ai/</login>)
Our Partners
![](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fyc_logo.png&w=384&q=75)
![](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Faws-logo.png&w=64&q=75)
![](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fteamwork_logo.png&w=640&q=75)
![](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fhero-v2-main-image.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fhero-v2-right-image.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fhero-v2-bottom-image.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Make Business Requirements Crystal Clear with AI-Guided Questions
[Get started](https://www.getadri.ai/</signup>)
### Automatically Verify Best Practice Adherence
Let AI ensure that your implementation design aligns with SAP S/4 HANA's recommendations 
![finds deviations from best practices](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fproduct_feature_1.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Instantly Identify Integration Points
Get immediate insights into inter-module dependencies and third-party system connections
![finds integration points](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fproduct_feature_2.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Proactively Detect Requirement Conflicts
Spot and resolve requirement inconsistencies early to prevent costly implementation delays
![finds requirement conflicts](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fproduct_feature_3.png&w=3840&q=75)
## How it works?
### 01. Write business requirements
Write business requirements in the Notes panel which is specifically designed for SAP consultants
### 02. Ask AI-generated clarifying questions 
Get instant clarifying questions for each requirement to decide SAP configuration details
### 03. Validate alignment with SAP Best Practices
Discuss deviations of the decided configuration from SAP Best Practices
### 04. Resolve conflicts
Discuss, with business users, any inconsistencies with previously recorded requirements
### 05. Plan for Integrations Points
Collaborate with relevant stakeholders about integrations with SAP modules and third-party systems
![](https://www.getadri.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fmarketing%2Fimages%2Fhow-adri-ai-works.png&w=3840&q=75)
[Get started](https://www.getadri.ai/</signup>)
## Welcome to the future of AI-led SAP ERP Migration
Try our cutting-edge AI tools today and eliminate migration mistakes, save time, and impress your clients with accurate, process-first results.
[Get started](https://www.getadri.ai/</signup>)

generated_description:
**Adri AI: Bringing Trust to AI Purchases**

Founded in 2022 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Adri AI is a fresh player in the artificial intelligence landscape, specifically tailored for enterprises looking to buy AI technology with confidence. Think of Adri as the "Vanta for AI"—a solution designed to ensure that the AI you adopt is reliable and secure.

**The Problem We're Solving:**
In today's fast-paced business environment, organizations are increasingly investing in AI. However, with great power comes great responsibility, especially regarding data privacy and compliance. Adri AI's patented software actively monitors the infrastructure of AI vendors, identifying any misuse—be it intentional or accidental—of your proprietary data. This means that when you buy AI, you can do so without the looming fear of compromising sensitive information.

**How It Works:**
Adri’s platform enhances clarity and efficiency in AI-driven SAP ERP migrations. With features like AI-generated clarifying questions, automatic validation of best practices, and proactive conflict detection, it's designed to minimize errors during migration projects. The process flows smoothly from documenting requirements, asking clarifying questions, to ensuring alignment with SAP's best practices.

**Core Features Include:**
1. **Verification of Best Practices**: The AI assesses your implementation design against SAP S/4 HANA recommendations.
2. **Integration Insights**: Instantly spot inter-module dependencies and third-party integrations.
3. **Conflict Resolution**: Early detection of inconsistencies prevents costly delays in implementation.

**Team and Support**: 
Despite having a small team of just two employees, Adri AI is backed by Y Combinator’s Batch W23, greatly enhancing its credibility. Diana Hu serves as the Group Partner, providing guidance and mentorship as they grow.

**Where to Find Adri AI**: 
Curious to see how they can help your business? Visit [Adri AI’s website](https://www.getadri.ai/) for more information and to get started with their innovative solutions.

In a world where AI adoption is ramping up, Adri AI is simplifying the process, ensuring companies can embrace this powerful tool without sacrificing trust or security. If you're in the market for AI, Adri AI might just be what you're looking for.
